this_title: Plastic Paradise: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch
trans_title: 塑料天堂：大太平洋垃圾带
introduction: "Plastic Paradise" is an independent documentary film that chronicles Angela Sun's personal journey of discovery to one of the most remote places on Earth, Midway Atoll, to uncover the truth behind the mystery of the Great Pacific Garbage Patch. Along the way she encounters scientists, celebrities, legislators and activists who shed light on what our society's vast consumption ...
chinese_title: 塑料天堂：大太平洋垃圾带
foreign_title: Plastic Paradise: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch
